ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Tools designed to make it easier for users, particularly beginner/intermediate R users to build ordinary least squares regression models. Includes comprehensive regression output, heteroskedasticity tests, collinearity diagnostics, residual diagnostics, measures of influence, model fit assessment and variable selection procedures.

Tools designed to make it easier for users, particularly beginner/intermediate R users to build ordinary least squares regression models. Includes comprehensive regression output, heteroskedasticity tests, collinearity diagnostics, residual diagnostics, measures of influence, model fit assessment and variable selection procedures.

name: r-olsrr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.6.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-olsrr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/olsrr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/olsrr/olsrr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e97298d8b640c61ea0cc3193a29011ea8dad3c2953b76bcda896afb0d4447f43

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-car
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-goftest
    - r-gridextra
    - r-nortest
    - r-xplorerr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-car
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-goftest
    - r-gridextra
    - r-nortest
    - r-xplorerr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('olsrr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('olsrr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://olsrr.rsquaredacademy.com/
  dev_url: https://github.com/rsquaredacademy/olsrr
  license: MIT
  summary: Tools designed to make it easier for users, particularly beginner/intermediate R users to build ordinary least squares regression models. Includes comprehensive regression output, heteroskedasticity tests, collinearity diagnostics, residual diagnostics, measures of influence, model fit assessment and variable
    selection procedures.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - comatrion
